abstract: Amazon’s success with the Kindle shows the power of serving small, but lucrative, niches.
snippet: Amazon’s success with the Kindle shows the power of serving small, but lucrative, niches.
lead_paragraph: If you can make something and sell it to the masses, that can be a great business. But sometimes selling something to a much smaller group can also be quite lucrative, if you pick the right product for the right customers.

headline.main: The Kindle Lets Amazon Make a Lot From the Few
